IRenderWindow

Defines interface for interacting with a render window. A render window is a window that has a DirectX devince associated with it along with a scene graph.

Functions
GetCamera
virtual CRefObj<ICamera> GetCamera() = 0

Returns the camera the window is using (which ultimately is set on the renderer)

SetCamera
virtual void SetCamera(
CRefObj<ICamera> spCamera
) = 0

Sets the camera the window is using (which ultimately is set on the renderer)

RecordEvent
virtual void RecordEvent(
HWND hWnd,
UINT message,
WPARAM wParam,
LPARAM lParam
) = 0

Records an mouse/keyboard event for processing by the UI later. Only used for ImGui at the moment.

Parameters
hWnd
HWND

window event occured in

message
UINT

integer of message ID

wParam
WPARAM

wParam from Windows

lParam
LPARAM

lParam from Windows

SetViewport
virtual void SetViewport(
float x0,
float y0,
float x1,
float y1
) = 0

Specifies the viewport for the final render target

Parameters
x0
float

top left X coordinate from 0..1 indicating which portion of the output window is used

y0
float

top left Y coordinate from 0..1 indicating which portion of the output window is used

x1
float

bottom right X coordinate from 0..1 indicating which portion of the output window is used

y1
float

bottom right Y coordinate from 0..1 indicating which portion of the output window is used

SetSnapPositions
virtual void SetSnapPositions(
const Vector3& home,
const Vector3& xAxis,
const Vector3& yAxis,
const Vector3& zAxis
) = 0

Sets the world positions for snapping the camera to when certain keys are pressed

Parameters
home
const Vector3&

Position to snap to when Home key is pressed

xAxis
const Vector3&

Position to snap to when X key is pressed

yAxis
const Vector3&

Position to snap to when Y key is pressed

zAxis
const Vector3&

Position to snap to when Z key is pressed

GetSceneGraph
virtual CRefObj<ISceneGraph> GetSceneGraph() = 0

Returns the scene graph associated with this render window

SetSceneGraph
virtual void SetSceneGraph(
ISceneGraph *pSceneGraph
) = 0

Sets the render window's scene graph to the specified scene graph

Parameters
pSceneGraph
ISceneGraph*

scene graph to set on render window

GetRenderer
virtual CRefObj<IRenderer> GetRenderer() = 0

Returns the renderer. This is the marshaling version of the renderer.

int x,
int y,
uint32 button,
uint32 flags
) = 0

Called when a mouse down event occurs in the window

Parameters

int

X position of mouse in pixels

y
int

Y position of mouse in pixels

button
uint32

integer indicating which button was pressed

flags
uint32

flags (control, shift, etc)

int factor
) = 0

CreateRenderWindow
CRefObj<IRenderWindow> CreateRenderWindow(
HWND hwnd,
BBox2& viewport,
std::wstring& shaderFolder,
std::function<void(IRenderer*, IRenderCtx*, int)> callback,
std::function<void(IRenderer*)> prePresentCallback,
bool startFrozen = false,
int desktopIndex = 0
)

Creates an IRenderWindow

Parameters
hwnd
HWND

window to bind IRenderWindow to

viewport
BBox2&

viewport for final render target

shaderFolder
std::wstring&

Path to folder containing shaders

callback
std::function<void(IRenderer*, IRenderCtx*, int)>

callback during rendering

prePresentCallback
std::function<void(IRenderer*)>

callback right before Present() is called

startFrozen
bool

should renderer start in frozen state

desktopIndex
int

index of desktop to use

Returns

Returns the created render window

CreateImguiRenderWindow
CRefObj<IRenderWindow> CreateImguiRenderWindow(
HWND hwnd,
BBox2& viewport,
std::wstring& shaderFolder,
std::function<void(Caustic::IRenderer*, ITexture*, ImFont*)> renderUI,
bool startFrozen = false,
int desktopIndex = 0
)

Creates an IRenderWindow that is using ImGui for its interface In this case the scene is rendered to a texture and then draw as an image by ImGui.

Parameters
hwnd
HWND

window to bind IRenderWindow to

viewport
BBox2&

viewport for final render target

shaderFolder
std::wstring&

Path to folder containing shaders

renderUI
std::function<void(Caustic::IRenderer*, ITexture*, ImFont*)>

callback for rendering UI

startFrozen
bool

should renderer start in frozen state

desktopIndex
int

index of desktop to use

Returns

Returns the created render window
